content.html: Cis het folks: There are jobs that will be directly targeted at hurting us. If you’re an ally, they don’t have to be done well. Or really at all if you’re clever.
content.value:
Cis het folks:

There are jobs that will be directly targeted at hurting us. If you’re an ally, they don’t have to be done well. Or really at all if you’re clever.

photo.alt:
“Is your job forcing you to hurt transgender people? Just fuck up the paperwork! You can save a life by not sending the email. Leave the form in a filing cabinet. Be a dick about something not filled out right. The more time you waste the better chance they escape.”

The above text is over a trans flag flying at a protest.
